pages.text: press k to open the skill screen. Hover over ? to get more infos.

pages.title: Sub Skill Screen's
pages.text: Check the things you can do in the respective sub skill screen's.

pages.title: Block Resrtictions
pages.text: Here you see a list of all Blocks that are locked to Mining Levels.

pages.title: Brewing Restrictions
pages.text: All Items, sorted by Levels, are listed in this category.

pages.title: How to gain XP ?
pages.text: Level XP Orb's are blue, while Vanilla XP Orb's are green.$(br2)The way to gain these xp is similar to vanilla.$(li)Fight Mobs$(li)Smelt Ores$(li)Trade$(li)...$(br2)In Addition to that, you can join Jobs to get even more Levelz XP.
